Rosservice call: /task_manager/human_status_update It is called by the human_agent to provide last information

Definition at line 288 of file TaskManager.cpp.

void TaskManager::initialize ( )
private

Initialize service and topic handlers.

Parameters
reqRequest object
resResponse object
Returns
True if initialization was successful

Task State: human states actions, robot state actions rewards and general info are published as a ROS topic

Definition at line 36 of file TaskManager.cpp.

bool TaskManager::initiateScenario ( hrc_ros::InitiateScenarioRequest &  req,
hrc_ros::InitiateScenarioResponse &  res 
)
private

Rosservice is called /task_manager/new_scenario_request This service is manually called from the terminal to initiate a new scenario: human, robot and obs agents are reset, a package arrives conveyor runs and stops in the middle of the human and the robot.

Definition at line 328 of file TaskManager.cpp.

bool TaskManager::packageGenerator ( )
private

Not implemented currently. In this application we only change the location of one package. No new generation. That is why when a new task is received the previous package processed is reput on the conveyor as a reprocess

Todo:
callout the package generation service: it is initiated by package_generator.py

Definition at line 403 of file TaskManager.cpp.

void TaskManager::ReceiveTraySensors ( const hrc_ros::TraySensor &  msg)
private

It receives the tray sensor information, a proximity sensor placed on the trays. It is received from MORSE which is implemented as a rostopic to constantly send the sensory info. It is pushed only when the value changes.

Definition at line 439 of file TaskManager.cpp.

bool TaskManager::ResetTask ( std_srvs::TriggerRequest &  req,
std_srvs::TriggerResponse &  res 
)
private

Rosservice is called /task_manager/reset_task This service is manually called from the terminal to reset a scenario: human, robot and obs agents are reset, a package arrives conveyor runs and stops in the middle of the human and the robot.
